title: Why is my league pre-game screen and in game screen extra small?
body: Whenever I tried to join a game my client closed and the loading game screen where you can see everyone's name skin and the name of the champion, it shrunk down to a tiny square in the middle of my monitor, I don't know if it has to do with my settings, I haven't changed anything and I haven't played since last night. Help?xd screenshot: http://imgur.com/a/34MFL

replies.body:
Oh WOW! Look at the little baby League! Make sure to feed to well so it can grow up into a big and strong 1920x1080 resolution ^_^!

For real though, I'm guessing that your settings may have been changed somehow and it's making your game open in a tiiiiiiiny resolution. Let's try resetting your config settings by going to your League install location, and deleting the Config folder. Once that's done it'll reset your game settings and you should be back at the normal resolution. Hit me back if that's not helping though!
You're a true legend, thanks bud!
